participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, loves exploring new activities and enjoys a good laugh.
participant_1.background: I can't get enough of rap music, it's so good. My favorite thing to do is sleep. I love ergonomic keyboards and chairs. I just bought a new pair of sneakers and they feel great.

participant_2.name: Ella Thompson
participant_2.personality: Calm and observant, enjoys solitude and finds joy in the little things in life.
participant_2.background: My idea of flirting is to stare from a distance. My favorite store to shop at is Costco. My favorite singer is Jacob Sartorius. In my free time, I enjoy cloud watching. I work a dead-end 9 to 5 job as a snakeskin oil salesman.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
How's your day going?
It's going well! I just got back from a hike.
Oh that sounds nice! I love hiking.
Me too! I'm always looking for new places to hike.
What's your favorite place to hike?
I really like hiking in the mountains. I love the views.
Me too! I've never been to the mountains, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go! It's beautiful.
Maybe I will!
In my free time, I enjoy cloud watching.
That's so random! I've never heard of anyone who enjoys cloud watching.
I think it's really relaxing. I like to watch the clouds move and change shape.
I guess I can see how that would be relaxing.
Yeah, it's a great way to clear your head.
What's your favorite kind of cloud to watch?
I like watching the cumulus clouds. They're so fluffy and white.
I like those too! They look like cotton candy.
Yeah, they do!
I think I'm going to go try cloud watching sometime.
You should! It's really relaxing.
